text: Today the Donald J. Trump for President campaign is pleased to announce the expansion of its campaign team. "These Advisors will be tasked with organizing the day to day operations for Governor Pence and interacting with the existing Trump Campaign team in an effort to take the campaigns message to the people." "The campaign welcomes the addition of Governor Pence and his team of advisors to the ticket. Governor Pence is a man of impeccable character and his addition to the ticket sends a powerful message to Hillary Clinton that America is not for sale" said   "We look forward to meeting with voters across this country and together we will Make America Great Again." The campaign will continue to expand and build a superior political team as it works towards defeating Hillary Clinton in November.
